featured.text: The police had to count on him to find out exactly how the accident happened.
All passengers riding in cars are required to fasten their seatbelts in order to reduce the risk of _____ in case of an accident.
How did the traffic accident ? (A) come about (B) come around (C) come off (D) come over 13.
A developing technology called Vehicle-to-Vehicle communication, or V2V, is being tested by automotive manufacturers as a way to help reduce the number of accidents.
Stress is linked to the six __(36)__ causes of death— heart disease, cancer, lung disease, accidents, liver disease, and suicide.

other.text: According to Dom, the main reason for the accident was that __________.
that John ________ escaped being killed in a traffic accident.
The man was severely injured in last weekend’s tragic car accident and died _____ afterwards.
Everyone runs the risk of accidents, and no one can be sure of avoiding 38 disease.
Badly injured in the car accident, Jason could ____
Dom said that the most important thing in this accident was __________.
Although Maggie has been physically _____ to her wheelchair since the car accident, she does not limit herself to indoor activities.
The police officer showed us pictures of drunk driving accidents to highlight the importance of staying _____ on the road.
It was caused by a traffic accident.
The future may be a vehicle-accident-free era.
In a radio interview, Dom expressed his disappointment and explained how the accident took place.
Helen let out a sigh of ______ after hearing that her brother was not injured in the accident.
The author probably got wounded in wars or accidents.
Due to numerous accidents that occurred while people were playing Pokémon GO, players were advised to be _____ of possible dangers in the environment.
Robert was the only _____ to the car accident.

definition.zh_def: 意外事件，通常指不幸或意外發生的情況。
definition.en_def: An unexpected event, typically resulting in damage or injury.
definition.example: She was involved in a car accident on her way to work.
